capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Ability to face challenging outdoor conditions and emergency situations such as firefighting.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Adherence to safety protocols and environmental conservation laws.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Self-motivation and fitness are crucial for success in physically demanding tasks.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respect for Aboriginal heritage and commitment to inclusive practices.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Clear communication with team members and the public, including responding to visitor enquiries.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Teamwork is essential for conservation efforts and emergency response.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Achievement of conservation goals and maintenance of park assets.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Problem-solving in field operations and emergency situations.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsibility for safe operation and maintenance of equipment.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Use of two-way radios and other technology for communication and operations.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Participation in conservation projects and park maintenance activities.

skills.name: Four-wheel driving
skills.description: Navigating rough terrains within parks and reserves.

skills.name: First Aid
skills.description: Providing immediate medical response in emergencies.

skills.name: Chainsaw Operation
skills.description: Safe use of chainsaws for tree felling and crosscutting.

skills.name: Firefighting
skills.description: Frontline firefighting duties and support roles.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.description: Working collaboratively with team members for conservation efforts.

skills.name: Problem-solving
skills.description: Identifying and resolving issues in field operations.

generalRole.title: Field Conservation Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves a combination of field operations, environmental conservation, and emergency response activities, requiring a blend of technical skills, physical fitness, and teamwork.
